channel.title: Moparscape help!
channel.description: help with moparscape ok.... In server world 8 wich is cheezscape i think. You can tele port without runes but if you cast a spell it says need required runes but i have like 1k of each rune in my inventory. And it wont work when I weild a stuff too. other question is. How do i turn objects into monsters? do i use ::setobject like that? and why are guards,heroes, fever spiders in the item inventory? if those are monsters to summon please tell me how to use them.

item.title: Moparscape help!
item.dc:creator: @willywoo willywoo
item.description:
@willywoo wrote:

what do u mean?
in ur inventory-just drop em and they will be monsters on the ground…believe me i got confused too

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape help!
item.dc:creator: @stupidleung4 stupidleung4
item.description:
@stupidleung4 wrote:

help with moparscape ok… In server world 8 wich is cheezscape i think. You can tele port without runes but if you cast a spell it says need required runes but i have like 1k of each rune in my inventory. And it wont work when I weild a stuff too.
other question is. How do i turn objects into monsters? do i use ::setobject like that? and why are guards,heroes, fever spiders in the item inventory? if those are monsters to summon please tell me how to use them.

Read full topic
